text: Ademola Okulaja (10 July 1975 â€“ 16 or 17 May 2022) was a Nigerian-born German professional basketball player. The last team he played for were the Brose Baskets of the Basketball Bundesliga. He played as a forward. Okulaja made 172 appearances for the German national team. Okulaja died on 16 or 17 May 2022 in Berlin, Germany at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German basketball players Category:Nigerian sportspeople Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Lagos
title: Ademola Okulaja
